column3: I recall something else.  That because some were written by some tourists who actually photograph their food
column5: and who eat way too much.  Aside from gluttony
column6: these reviews feature food photos which remind me of all the plastic
column7: polystyrene and disposable junk in which nearly all of Smoque's dishes are served.  This is a small-site EPA disaster area
column9: but the fat women could care less.
